DOC.brief_summary: - Measure mid-facial volumetric correction SCULPTRA treatment , use three-dimensional digital surface image - Determine mean change baseline facial contour deficiency measure Dermik Nasolabial Photo-numeric Scale - Correlate volumetric correction clinical improvement measure Dermik Nasolabial Photo-numeric Scale - Correlate mean volumetric change mid-facial treatment area amount product use - Evaluate subject investigator global assessment improvement subject treatment satisfaction end treatment - Obtain photographs pre- post-treatment purpose provide subject visual aid course treatment - Collect safety data
DOC.brief_title: A Single-Center , Open-Label , Exploratory Study Volumizing Effect SCULPTRA Measured Three Dimensional Digital Surface Imaging
DOC.criteria: Subjects must sign statement informed consent . Subjects must 1875 year age , race gender . Female patient childbearing potential must negative urine pregnancy test prior first treatment product must use acceptable form birth control throughout study ( e.g. , oral/systemic contraceptive , intrauterine device ( IUD ) Norplant start least 28 day prior study entry throughout study ) . Subjects must display sign facial contour deficiency area nasolabial fold [ nasolabial fold score great equal 2 ( bilaterally ) Dermik Nasolabial Photonumeric Scale . Subjects must suitable candidate SCULPTRA treatment . Subjects must able understand requirement study willing comply study requirement Subjects allergy constituent product . Subjects know history keloid bleed disorder . Subjects childbearing potential pregnant , plan become pregnant within study timeframe , nursing . Subjects significant facial hair ( e.g . mustache , beard , etc . ) Subjects active inflammatory process infection area treat ( skin eruption cyst , pimple , rash , cancerous/precancerous lesion , active skin disease treatment area ) . Subjects plan undergo major facial surgery [ e.g. , rhinoplasty ( without implant ) , facelift , congenital defect repair , etc . ] course study . Subjects use plan use exclusionary medications/treatments .
